dd_node.name: dvalue_desc
dd_node.name_cn: 按照每天、每小时等时间段计算此累计值的差值。如流量计每天累计值通过当天起始时间和结束时间的差值获得
dd_node.name_en: Calculate the difference between this cumulative value based on daily, hourly, and other time periods. The daily cumulative value of the flow meter is obtained by the difference between the start and end times of the day

dd_node.name: jmpchg_desc
dd_node.name_cn: 值根据一定规则从一个值到另一个值的变化做记录
dd_node.name_en: Record the changes in values from one value to another according to certain rules

dd_node.name: stbpts_desc
dd_node.name_cn: 值根据变化斜率低于一定的值做记录
dd_node.name_en: Record the value based on the slope of change below a certain value

dd_node.name: mutpts_desc
dd_node.name_cn: 值根据变化斜率超过一定的值做记录
dd_node.name_en: Record the value based on the slope of change exceeding a certain value

dd_node.name: name_existed
dd_node.name_cn: 相同名字的对象已经存在
dd_node.name_en: An object with the same name already exists
